Module jGame
Package jGame.logging

Class ProgramLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • jGame.logging.ProgramLogger
  • public class ProgramLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    The main logger for this application. All major logging requests are done to this class, which outputs logs according to this implementation.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Nuno Pereira

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.util.logging.Handler fileHandler
      Handler object that writes logs requested by the LOGGER to a ".log" file
      private static java.util.logging.Logger LOGGER

      • writeBigLog

        public static void writeBigLog​(java.util.Properties p)

        Parameters:
        p - the Properties object from which key/value pairs will be printed
        Since:

        Properties, StringBuilder

      • writeBigLog

        public static void writeBigLog​(java.util.Properties p,
                               java.lang.String comment)
        Write a line with the format: key - value, for each key/pair value contained in this Properties argument, after logging a comment associated with the log.
        Parameters:
        p - the Properties object from which key/value pairs will be printed
        comment - a comment to be logged before the key/value pairs
        Since:
        1.0.0
